What is this?

This website is an attempt at creating an audio version of the artist's game "Exquisite Corpse" . The idea is for many people to each work semi-blindfolded on a small portion of a song, mixtape or even spoken word story until it reaches a certain number of contributers, then the entire project is unlocked and users can hear the entire 'Warp' that they created together.

1) The first person that starts the project AKA "admin" gives it a name and sets a number of contributers it will have (up to 10).
2) Next, they upload the first piece of audio (either wav or mp3) to the project.
3) After that, they use the button to cue the part of the audio they want to send to the next user. Everything to the left of the cue will be hidden and the next user can only sample/hear the audio to the right of the cue. You'd want to pick an outro, a break, or (if it is spoken word) the last sentance of the audio clip for example.
4) Then hit the button to save the place you cued the end snippet.
5) Last, punch in the email of the next person you want to invite to contribute. They will only get the snippet sent to them and have the option of downloading the snippet as a wav to sample and loop if they need . That person must pass it on to someone else until the Warp reaches the total contributors, chain letter style.
If anything doesn't work or you have any idea to improve this hit the button up top.
Created by Brendan O'Keefe, who happens to be looking for a job. Hire me! or Beer me
!
